network

Class Connect4Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Connect4Client

  • public class Connect4Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Networking portion of the client application
    Version:
    2/16/20
    Author:
    Ryan Cluff, rpcluff, rpcluff@asu.edu

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Connect4Client.InputListener
      A class implementing runnable that continually listens for input and updates the ui accordingly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream in
      An object input stream for recieve game state object with which to update the ui
      private java.io.DataOutputStream out
      A data output stream for indicating which columns to select
      private java.net.Socket socket
      Socket used for network communication
      private UI ui
      Reference to the UI object, used for updating visuals

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connect4Client(UI ui, boolean onePlayer)
      Starting the networking client, creates input listeners for ui updates

      • Connect4Client

        public Connect4Client(UI ui,

        Starting the networking client, creates input listeners for ui updates
        Parameters:
        ui - Reference to the UI object, used for updating visuals
        onePlayer - true is one player game, false if two player game
